courses.title: Explore Our Courses
courses.description: Discover the technical courses we offer, designed to prepare you for the challenges of the modern job market.

items.title: Cybersecurity and Networks
items.description: Learn to protect computer systems and networks against cyber threats and implement robust security solutions.

items.title: Electronics and Hardware
items.description: Master the development of embedded systems and hardware control through microcontrollers.

items.title: Programming
items.description: Develop skills in modern programming languages and software development methodologies.

items.title: Mechanics
items.description: Study the fundamental principles of mechanics, machines and industrial mechanical systems.

items.title: Electrical Engineering
items.description: Learn about electrical systems, installations and maintenance of electrical equipment.

items.title: Renewable Energy
items.description: Explore sustainable technologies and renewable energy systems for a greener future.

features.title: Discover Our Educational Offering
features.description: Learn about the fundamental pillars that make António Sérgio School Group a reference in quality education.

items.title: Academic Progression
items.description: We offer complete educational pathways from pre-school to secondary education, preparing our students for higher education and the job market.

items.title: Academic Life
items.description: We promote a dynamic and inclusive academic environment with extracurricular activities, interdisciplinary projects, and cultural events.

items.title: Educational Support
items.description: We provide personalized support services, vocational guidance, and pedagogical assistance to ensure the success of all students.

items.subtitle: Years of Recognition and International Reach

campus.title: What Drives Us
campus.description: António Sérgio School Group seeks to define itself as a pioneer of educational innovation at the national level, encouraging new students to develop their maximum potential and become active and conscious citizens.

participate.title: Join This Journey
participate.description: Contact us and discover how you can contribute to our educational community.

education.title: Build Your Education Foundation
education.description: Learn about our courses and discover how they can lead you to a bright future.
